snippet: The night-life impresario Susanne Bartsch, who oversees a Vandam party at Greenhouse nightclub on Sundays, pairs big hair with outsize style.
abstract: Night-life impresario Susanne Bartsch, who oversees a weekly Vandam party at the Greenhouse nightclub in New York City, describes the colorful and often outrageous outfits she wore over one week during the holidays.
lead_paragraph: The night-life impresario Susanne Bartsch, who oversees a Vandam party at Greenhouse nightclub on Sundays, pairs big hair with outsize style.

headline.seo: Susanne Bartsch, Night-Life Impresario - What I Wore
headline.main: A Wig to Match Every Look
headline.print_headline: A Wig to Match Every Look
